basics.name: Ryan Dormanesh
basics.label: Game Designer
basics.summary: A game designer who has worked in AAA, mobile, and indie games.

work.name: Midnight Club 3: Dub Edition
work.summary: Contributed to the successful launch of the game by discovering and thoroughly documenting bugs related to gameplay balance, graphic rendering, UI, crashes, and multiplayer functionality with a keen eye for detail.

work.name: Rockstar Presents: Table Tennis
work.summary: Guided a seamless certification process with Microsoft by conducting regular assessments of their Technical Certification Requirements and providing comprehensive reports to the team throughout the development phase.

work.name: Red Dead Redemption
work.summary: Contributed to the quality and immersive experience of Red Dead Redemption through the design and development of over 600 dynamic state machines, ensuring seamless integration of animations, sound, and special effects with the game engine.

work.name: Cafe World
work.summary: Provided leadership for the quality assurance efforts on all Cafe World content releases, ensuring their seamless delivery to millions of daily active users during a critical developer transition period.

work.name: Cookie Jam Series
work.summary: Crafted engaging game levels for Cookie Jam series, directly contributing to increased in-game purchases and player retention.

work.name: Perfect Swing - Golf
work.summary: Enhanced collaboration across teams, managing timelines and ensuring the delivery of the worldwide launch of a high quality Unreal powered golf simulator.

awards.title: Company Game Jam Winner
awards.summary: Game Designer on a unique game that won the company wide annnual Game Jam as voted by senior staff.

independent projects.name: NumMerge
independent projects.summary: A puzzle game about merging balls in numerical order.

independent projects.name: Guess Quest
independent projects.summary: A high or low card betting game made in one day.
